entry.value: SELECT distinct lower(application_id||'_'||COALESCE(environment,'')) as Instance_id, lower(partition_id) as Equipment_id FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_id IS NOT NULL AND application_id <> '' AND environment <> '' AND partition_id <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(application_id) as application_id, lower(application_id||'_'||COALESCE(environment,'')) as Instance_id, environment as environment FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_id IS NOT NULL AND application_id <> '' AND environment <> ''

SELECT distinct REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag, lower(partition_id) as equipment_id, number_of_access as nbusers FROM FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND partition_id IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND partition_id <> '' AND product_version <> ''

select distinct lower(application_id) as application_id, lower(application_name) as name, '' as version, accountable as owner, lower(domaine) as domain from FLOWFILE WHERE application_id <> '' AND application_name <> ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_hostname) as server_hostname, lower(server_localization) as server_localization, lower(server_model) as server_model, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, used_processor_sockets as used_processor_sockets, core_per_processor as core_per_processor, core_factor as core_factor, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(owner) as exploitation, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id <> '' AND server_hostname <> '' AND cpu_model <> '' AND used_processor_sockets <> '' AND core_per_processor <> '' AND core_factor <> ''

SELECT distinct lower(application_id||'_'||COALESCE(environment,'')) as Instance_id, REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_id IS NOT NULL AND application_id <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND environment <> '' AND product_version <> ''

select distinct lower("partition_id") as partition_id, lower("partition_hostname") as partition_hostname, lower("logical_cpu") as logical_cpu, lower("logical_cores") as logical_cores, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE partition_id IS NOT NULL AND partition_hostname IS NOT NULL AND logical_cpu IS NOT NULL AND logical_cores IS NOT NULL AND server_id IS NOT NULL AND partition_id <> '' AND partition_hostname <> '' AND logical_cpu <> '' AND logical_cores <> '' AND server_id <> ''

select distinct swidtag as swidtag, sku as sku, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, product_version as product_version, edition as edition, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, "maintenance_start" as maintenance_start, "maintenance_end" as maintenance_end from FLOWFILE WHERE swidtag IS NULL OR sku IS NULL OR product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR product_version IS NULL OR metric IS NULL OR unit_price IS NULL OR acquired_licenses IS NULL OR swidtag = '' OR sku = '' OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR product_version = '' OR metric = '' OR unit_price = '' OR acquired_licenses = ''
select distinct lower("vcenter_name") as vcenter_name, lower("vcenter_version") as vcenter_version from FLOWFILE WHERE vcenter_name <> ''

select DISTINCT REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag, product_name as name, product_editor as editor, product_version as version, '' as category, '' as IsOptionOf from FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> ''
select distinct lower("cluster_name") as cluster_name, lower("vcenter_name") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE cluster_name <> ''

processors.name: Store Original File Name and ID

entry.value: SELECT distinct lower(application_id) as application_id, REPLACE(product_name||'_'||COALESCE(product_editor,'')||'_'||COALESCE(product_version,''),' ','_') as swidtag FROM FLOWFILE WHERE application_id IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND application_id <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> ''

select distinct lower(server_id) as server_id, lower(server_hostname) as server_hostname, lower(server_localization) as server_localization, lower(server_model) as server_model, lower(cpu_model) as cpu_model, used_processor_sockets as used_processor_sockets, core_per_processor as core_per_processor, core_factor as core_factor, lower(hyperthreading) as hyperthreading, lower(owner) as exploitation, lower(datacenter_name) as datacenter_name, lower(cluster_name) as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE server_id IS NULL OR server_hostname IS NULL OR cpu_model IS NULL OR used_processor_sockets IS NULL OR core_per_processor IS NULL OR core_factor IS NULL OR server_id = '' OR server_hostname = '' OR cpu_model = '' OR used_processor_sockets = '' OR core_per_processor = '' OR core_factor = ''

select distinct product_name as product_name, product_editor as product_editor, product_version as product_version, lower(application_id) as application_id, lower(application_name) as application_name, '' as version, accountable as owner, lower(domaine) as domain, lower(partition_id) as equipment_id, environment as environment from FLOWFILE WHERE application_id IS NULL OR application_name IS NULL OR product_name IS NULL OR product_editor IS NULL OR product_version IS NULL OR partition_id IS NULL OR environment IS NULL OR environment = '' OR partition_id = '' OR product_name = '' OR product_editor = '' OR product_version = '' OR application_id = '' OR application_name = ''

select distinct lower("partition_id") as partition_id, lower("partition_hostname") as partition_hostname, lower("logical_cpu") as logical_cpu, lower("logical_cores") as logical_cores, lower("server_id") as parent_id from FLOWFILE WHERE partition_id IS NULL OR partition_hostname IS NULL OR logical_cores IS NULL OR logical_cpu IS NULL OR server_id IS NULL OR partition_id = '' OR partition_hostname = '' OR logical_cores = '' OR logical_cpu = '' OR server_id = ''

select distinct swidtag as swidtag, sku as sku, product_name as product_name, product_editor as editor, product_version as product_version, edition as edition, metric as metric, acquired_licenses as acquired_licenses, maintenance_licences as maintenance_licenses, unit_price as unit_price, maintenance_unit_price as maintenance_unit_price, "maintenance_start" as maintenance_start, "maintenance_end" as maintenance_end, unit_price * acquired_licenses as total_license_cost, COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_maintenance_cost, COALESCE(unit_price,0) * COALESCE(acquired_licenses,0) + COALESCE(maintenance_unit_price,0) * COALESCE(maintenance_licences,0) as total_cost from FLOWFILE WHERE swidtag IS NOT NULL AND sku IS NOT NULL AND product_name IS NOT NULL AND product_editor IS NOT NULL AND product_version IS NOT NULL AND metric IS NOT NULL AND acquired_licenses IS NOT NULL AND unit_price IS NOT NULL AND swidtag <> '' AND sku <> '' AND product_name <> '' AND product_editor <> '' AND product_version <> '' AND metric <> '' AND acquired_licenses <> '' AND unit_price <> ''
